message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you might be even greater. After careful consideration, I propose to sell it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return and offering you a competitive advantage over other potential buyers. I believe this is a fair and attractive offer that allows both parties to benefit. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or discuss further details.
